clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Participants With Non-Valvular Atrial Fibrillation (NVAF) Treated or Untreated With Oral Anticoagulant in the National Cerebral and Cardiovascular Center (NCVC) in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Medical Chart Review Study for Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation Patients Treated or Untreated With Oral Anticoagulant in the National Cerebral and Cardiovascular Center (NCVC) in Japan

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observational study is to understand real-world oral anticoagulants (OAC) (warfarin, apixaban, dabigatran, edoxaban and rivaroxaban) usage for non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Specialization of the treating physician
Distribution of socio-demographic characteristics of NVAF participants: Age group
Distribution of socio-demographic characteristics of NVAF participants: Gender
Distribution of socio-demographic characteristics of NVAF participants: Body weight

Distribution of outcome of NVAF participants: Degree of life freedom
Distribution of outcomes of NVAF participants: Hospitalization/outpatient status
Distribution of outcomes of NVAF participants: Systolic and diastolic blood pressure
Distribution of clinical characteristics of NVAF participants: Risk factors for stroke/bleeding
Distribution of clinical characteristics of NVAF participants: Comorbidities
Distribution of outcomes of NVAF participants: OAC prescription and administration status
Distribution of medication prescribed during baseline: angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (ACE)
Distribution of medication prescribed during baseline: angiotensin-receptor blocker (ARB)
Distribution of medication prescribed during baseline: beta blocker

Distribution of medication prescribed during baseline: proton pump inhibitor (PPI)
Distribution of medication prescribed during baseline: H2-receptor antagonist

arm_group.description: Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulant - Warfarin
Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulant - Apixaban
Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulant - Dabigatran
Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulant - Edoxaban
Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulant - Rivaroxaban
Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulants

study_pop.textblock:
An estimated 12,000 NVAF patients' medical charts within the identification period 01-July-2010 to the latest date of data availability in 2019 are expected to fulfill the study eligibility criteria.
- Sub-population 1: Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants receiving oral anticoagulants
- Sub-population 2: Non-valvular atrial fibrillation (NVAF) participants not receiving oral anticoagulants

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding Bristol-Myers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com.
Inclusion Criteria:
- Individuals â‰¥ 20 years old as of the index date
- At least 1 diagnosis of NVAF during index date, identified by any medical record
Exclusion Criteria:
- Had no data of serum creatinine in the patient's medical records
- Had no data of body weight in the patient's medical records
- Were given OAC for treatment of diseases other than AF
